Text: What you are doing here is awesome ยง You are the only one to keep updating thanks a lot.
What a great game, it just keeps getting better. Thanks K, kids love this!

@ MrIzzet

My sentiments exactly! Awesome job by K.
My pleasure to share it with you guys ;)
Thanks for another great upload! I notice that your forum link now go straight to the web host's ad page. Is this a temporary technical issue or has the forum been moved elsewhere?
Does anyone know if you can use any of these updates with this Dungeon.Defenders.v7.25c.Update.incl.DLC-SKIDROW ? Also, does each update need to be done seperately or can you just get the latest?
@Doziness: please reinstall 7.32 (http://thepiratebay.se/user/kompas909/) then follow the patch.

This seems to be for a console.  I merged it with my folers and started the game, only to find gamepad letters over the options given and mouse functions didn't work.  

I had to start over with fresh Binary/UDKGame folders and update each one, sadly.  You might want to recheck this one again...that or there's a problem on my end, but I don't think that's the case.  Thanks for the time and effort you put into this though, this game is an addiction...I can't stop playing it...

See, someone else got the XBOX interface as I had.

@jaquiow You just go to settings and change them back to PC. The patch works perfectly fine after that.
All I had to do to fix the Xbox thing was reopen DunDefConfig.exe and click SAVE.

I remember going to the config and looking for how to change things back but i didn't see an option to switch between xbox settings and PC, though I do have some side-by-side listings of of lists, but there's no way to pick a specific category.

Saving when it was opened...I don't think I did that, I think I just canceled when seeing the above.  I guess I can try again, see if it works.  Thanks for the help.
